label: A22B_cF184_227_cdfg_a-001
title: Zn$_{22}$Zr Structure
comments:
(Samson, 1961) gives the atomic coordinates in terms of setting 1 of space group $F\overline{4}dm$ \#227.  We have shifted this to the standard setting 2, where the inversion site of the lattice is at the origin. 
 Samson also suggests that the ``Zn$_{14}$Zr'' structure is created when zirconium atoms replace some of the zinc atoms on the (16c) site [the (16d) site in Samson's orientation]. 
 This structure can be derived from the \href{current_web_home_dir/A18B2C3_cF184_227_fg_d_ac-001}{Mg$_{3}$Cr$_{2}$Al$_{18}$ structure}.
